    • Method Detail

      • linearLayout

        public void linearLayout(float margin,
                java.util.ArrayList<VisualAtom> visualElements)
        Assigns coordinates to each VisualAtom on an horizontal axis. The length of the axis is the width of the Applet minus 2* margin. Center is at (0,0)
        Parameters:
        margin - the gap between the Applet margin and each extreme of the axis
